long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OrigamiQR - Capture web data from computer to mobile device with QR encoding technology

Features:
 - Clean and easy to use interface with one click operation
 - Captures website URL
 - Captures website text
